reviews.review: Es muy bueno, las mecanicas son unicas y te da la diversion y tension que no muchos juegos te da xD
Great way to waste a night and feel remorse if you get stuck in a lobby full of Russian kids who are past their bedtime!
In diesem Spiel gibt es alles , willst du getiltete Russen oder tryHarder hier gibt es alles ^^

honestly, the game isn't that bad itself. work on your awful anticheat and do something about the community, i've reported so many people for toxicity and cheating that i don't think it's possible to count it. writing this review right after a ranked game where i was first on the leaderboard but some random was saying "drop awp or i'll fucking kill you" and when i told him to shut up he started calling me a "russian whore". last round before winning the match i got vote kicked for no reason so guessing he was playing with friends. also when i checked his profile after the match all the comments were people saying that he's using wallhacks. 10/10 game worth it's price
